price: Na milima itakuwa kama sufi zilizo chambuliwa!
footnotes: Na milima itakuwa kama sufi iliyo tiwa rangi na kuchambuliwa kwa kutapanyika vipande mbali mbali na kupeperuka katika anga huku na huku.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
